name: How Did A Cat Get Here? 2.0
name_original: How Did A Cat Get Here? 2.0
description:
Old Modifications:

  1. A complete, unique, and fun new level! Check it out! (It's level 2)
  2. New player sprite, including animations. She's a cat now.
  3. New enemy/obstacle! Stalactites on the ceiling will fall on you and deal 3 damage on collision!
    1. This required a new sprite, a new script, and edits to the "damage" script.

New Modifications:

  1. Main menu/cover art, ft. our heroine: kitty!
  2. A complete aesthetic revamp of the UI, using Crusenho's "GUI Essential v 1.0 [Full Version]."
  3. All new sound effects for the player (cat), ft. my IRL cat, Eartha (She's a very talented voice actress, I'm so proud of her)!
